instruction: Given a description of a computer system, design a user interface with at least 4 features.
input: The computer system is a library management system.
output:
The user interface for a library management system should include at least 4 features: 

1. A search bar. This feature will allow users to search for books, magazines, and other documents by title, author, subject, and other keywords.
2. A tab for viewing and editing user profiles. This feature will allow users to view and edit their personal information such as name, address, phone number, and email address.
3. A feature that allows users to check out books. This feature will allow users to select books and other documents from the library's catalog and check them out using their library card. 
4. A feature that allows users to make payments and renewals. This feature will allow users to pay fines or renew library resources at the click of a button. 

These features will make it easy for library members to manage their accounts and access library resources.
